section.title: Time and Expense Sheet
section.para: When selecting New from the Open Sheets screen, the following screen will appear:

listitem.para: The current Sheet number. This is assigned with the Sheet is saved.
The date of the Sheet. This date may be a weekending date or some other period date that defines the billing time frame.
Select the specific Site for the Sheet.
Select the specific Employee for the Sheet.

section.para: When selecting the Line Items tab, the following screen will appear:

listitem.para: The current Sheet number.
The Line Number of the specific line item.
The Date of the Sheet.
The Date of the actual time or expense.
The Customer selected for the line item.
The Customer PO.
The selected Item.
The item description.
The quantity of Hours or of the Expense entry.
The rate entered for the Time or Expense entry.
The extended total for the line.
Type of entry. 'T' for Time. 'E' for Expense.
Opens line entry screen for creating a new Line.
Enables you to edit highlighted Line. Double-clicking on a Line will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Line and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Line and then select this button to remove the Line from the list.

section.para: When selecting the Sheet Notes tab, the following screen will appear:
Notes entered for the Sheet are for reference purposes only and will not appear on any Invoices or Vouchers.
